replies.bodyText:
We discussed this further and come up with following solution.
You will technically return Map<String,Map<String,String>>.

Keys will be names of the sponsored members, so that GUI can map each result to the originating data.
Value will be map again, with keys status, login and password. Then in status you can put "OK" or "Error - ....message...." and in login/password you put generated UČO a password respectively.
This way we can pass all necessary information to the GUI and extend it in the future if necessary.

Please add detailed description about object structure to the Javadoc.
